# Mind (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Boccob]], [[Ilsensine]], [[Olidammara]], Wee Jas |
| | *Kalamar:* | *The Coddler, Eye Opener, Fate Scribe, Prince of Terror* |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** You gain a +2 bonus on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]], [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] and [[Sense Motive (Skill)|Sense Motive]] checks.

**Mind Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Comprehend Languages (Spell)|Comprehend Languages]]****:** Understand all spoken and written languages.

**2** **[[Detect Thoughts (Spell)|Detect Thoughts]]****:** Allows “listening” to surface thoughts.

**3 [[Telepathic Bond, Lesser (Spell)|Telepathic Bond, Lesser]]:** Link with subject within 30 ft. for 10 minutes/level.

**4** **[[Discern Lies (Spell)|Discern Lies]]****:** Reveals deliberate falsehoods.

**5** **[[Telepathic Bond (Spell)|Telepathic Bond]]****:** Lets all allies communicate.

**6 Probe Thoughts:** Read subject’s memories, one question/round.

**7** **[[Brain Spider (Spell)|Brain Spider]]****:** Eavesdrop on thoughts of up to eight other creatures.

**8** **[[Mind Blank (Spell)|Mind Blank]]****:** Subject is immune to mental/emotional magic and scrying.

**9** **[[Weird (Spell)|Weird]]****:** As *[[Phantasmal Killer (Spell)|phantasmal killer]]*, but affects all within 30 feet.
